articles.author: James Moultrie
articles.title: Tour de France stage 13 Live - GC battle on Grand Colombier - Cyclingnews
articles.description: A punchy 137km from Châtillon-sur-Chalaronne to Grand Colombier on Bastille day
articles.content:
2023-07-14T13:02:45.049Z80KM TO GO
The break to the gap is stable at 1:30. The break are working well, but just aren't being given enough leeway to try and fight for the stage win. 
2023-07-14T12:5… [+9726 chars]
